channel.title: UI framework on Product Lead, Head of Design at buzzvil

item.title: UX Design Lead @CMS Group
item.description: CMS group (previously 3S Informatique) offered me my first long projects. I spent more than 3 years working on research-oriented projects. I could adjust the methods I learned at school, learn how to interact inside a development team, and publish my very first research paper in Tokyo.
